page.title: 15POPULATION
page.content:
The population of Cubert and Holywell having remained relatively stable for many years, has increased dramatically in the last l0 years with housing development taking place in the vicinity of the church, Chynowen Parc and Wheal Golden at Holywell.
Many established residents are concerned that this development has come too rapidly for the village considering the limited amenities and employment prospects.
{Electrol roll census}figures for l976 were 443 compared with 735 in l985. {Population census}figures for l98l were 825 but this has probably reached almost l000 in l985. There are 7 Parish councillors who meet monthly. The area of the parish is 34l9 acres.
